attributes.action: Provide support for Brits that want to go and Fight Putin in Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: It's the right thing to do if we don't want to get involved as a country we should confirm that any individuals that want to do the right thing will be supported and not criminalised.
attributes.background: Recognise that anyone wanting to fight Putin in Ukraine is not a criminal and provide them with proper equipment and contacts.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Exempt UK military personnel travelling to fight for Ukraine from prosecution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611142

Help volunteers in the UK to join the Ukraine International Legion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610568
